body.name: AmazerBath Bamboo Over The Toilet Storage Shelf, Over Toilet Bathroom Organizer Rack, 3-Tier Bathroom Shelves Over Toilet, Space Saver, Espresso
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 52 mins
features: Optimize bathroom space: Our 3-tier over-the-toilet storage shelf maximizes your bathroom space, allowing you to neatly organize your essentials without cluttering your counters.

Premium eco-friendly: Crafted from carefully selected bamboo, our above toilet storage unit is not only sturdy and durable but also environmentally friendly. Its natural and elegant design adds a touch of sophistication to your bathroom decor.
Effortless assembly: No tools or screws required. Our user-friendly design ensures easy and hassle-free assembly of the toilet shelf, saving you time and effort.

Perfect size: With dimensions of 25 x 10 x 71 inches, our bathroom toilet shelf fits most toilets. The adjustable bottom bar ensures compatibility while avoiding interference with the toilet water valve.
Enhanced stability: The bamboo organizer shelf comes with four adjustable feet, you can adjust the height of these anti-slip feet to increase the stability of the shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was very easy to assemble. No tools needed. It is sturdy above the toilet and looks great. Holds everything one would need it to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, stylish and practical.
reviews.reviewText: This over the toilet shelf gives my older bathroom a much more elegant look! It’s also very tall and feels sturdy. Assembly was quick and I had it up and ready to use in less than 15 min, including unboxing and reading over the instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Very easy to assemble. Looked at the picture and could figure it out. Beautiful in appearance and very sturdy. Already had gone through two others (one stainless that rusted) and another that just never went together well. Cheaply made. Lesson learned. I did not mount it to the wall as it would have to be drilled in concrete (basement bathroom), but the adjustable feet were easy to maneuver and it isn't going anywhere.Con: Yes, there is only one con. The shelves are hinged in the middle. The hinges for each shelf are on the underside of the shelf. If the top one could have been all one piece, the hinges would not be visible. Not sure why they cannot be one solid piece for all three but maybe shipping was a factor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, good-looking shelves!
reviews.reviewText: Really like the way these look in my bathroom. They are simple, yet nice-looking, and they do the job of holding all my stuff! Also easy (and fun) to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice looking wood shelving
reviews.reviewText: This over the toilet shelving unit is nice and good looking. The assembly was easy and everything went together well. I agree with one of the other comments made by a purchaser. The shelves are foldable so there is a visible hinge when you open and attach the shelves to the unit. Unfortunatley, I think this minor flaw detracts from the beauty of the shelves. It probably would be better to have the shelves made to regular length. ( I will probably buy some nice wood and do a hack to change out the hinges.) We also secured the shelving unit to the wall with the provided attachments. This made the unit much more sturdy. We are very pleased and love our shelving unit and are keeping it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and holds a lot. Easy to assemble, but start at the bottom.
reviews.reviewText: Bathroom storage is a premium we generally don't have (main bathroom is currently tiny). We were looking for an over the toilet shelf to add some much-needed space to accommodate just that, but they were either extremely pricey or looked to be cheaply made (every metal shelf I've ever had has been a rickety mess). I decided to take a chance on the AmazerBath Over The Toilet Bamboo Storage Shelf, and it was honestly a great choice. It's much more stable than the metal shelves I've had in the past, but the price is comparable (actually cheaper). The screw-in installation is easy, but make sure you start at the bottom (being the smart guy that I am, I didn't bother to read the instructions and started at the top, only to have to completely disassemble it to restart from the bottom...don't be like me, read the instructions). The shelves have a hinged design where they fold open to form the shelf. I was a bit worried that might result in a weaker or unstable product, but it's had no problems holding up towels, bins with random toiletries and heavy bottles of shampoo and condition. The bamboo itself is pretty lightweight, but the shelf is quite stable and a bit more water resistant because of it. I like the product, and will be getting a second for our other bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this it’s not super sturdy but for paper goods and towels it’s perfect. It looks very nice and great quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy - - stable - - big!
reviews.reviewText: This is meant to simply replace an item which was very hard to keep clean in my bathroom. It turned out to be super handy, although not really modern and stylish. It is just useful and snapped together easily, with a hinge to fold on each shelf. Shelves are wide and deep enough to place folded bath towels easily, the legs are perfectly spaced to create a sturdy stance. (This is a bit expensive for a utility need but serves so well I now have 3 of them!) Highly recommended based on 2-4 weeks of use.A delay in shipment on one of the items was fairly short, and a friend saw this in my place and ordered one for herself.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to assemble, not like flatpack.
reviews.reviewText: Lovely green feeling to the tiny bathroom I have. Highly recommend.
